io.netty.handler.codec

类 HeadersUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.HeadersUtils

  • public final class HeadersUtils
extends Object
    Provides utility methods related to Headers.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Headers.get(Object) and convert each element of List to a String.
      static <K,V> String getAsString(Headers<K,V,?> headers, K name)
      Headers.get(Object) and convert the result to a String.
      static Iterator<Map.Entry<String,String>> iteratorAsString(Iterable<Map.Entry<CharSequence,CharSequence>> headers)
      Headers.iterator() which converts each Map.Entry's key and value to a String.
      static Set<String> namesAsString(Headers<CharSequence,CharSequence,?> headers)
      Headers.names() and convert each element of Set to a String.
      static <K,V> String toString(Class<?> headersClass, Iterator<Map.Entry<K,V>> headersIt, int size)
      Helper for implementing toString for DefaultHeaders and wrappers such as DefaultHttpHeaders.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAllAsString

        public static <K,V> List<String> getAllAsString(Headers<K,V,?> headers,
                                                K name)
        Headers.get(Object) and convert each element of List to a String.
        参数:
        name - the name of the header to retrieve
        返回:
        a List of header values or an empty List if no values are found.

      • getAsString

        public static <K,V> String getAsString(Headers<K,V,?> headers,
                                       K name)
        Headers.get(Object) and convert the result to a String.
        参数:
        headers - the headers to get the name from
        name - the name of the header to retrieve
        返回:
        the first header value if the header is found. null if there's no such entry.

      • iteratorAsString

        public static Iterator<Map.Entry<String,String>> iteratorAsString(Iterable<Map.Entry<CharSequence,CharSequence>> headers)
        Headers.iterator() which converts each Map.Entry's key and value to a String.

      • toString

        public static <K,V> String toString(Class<?> headersClass,
                                    Iterator<Map.Entry<K,V>> headersIt,
                                    int size)
        Helper for implementing toString for DefaultHeaders and wrappers such as DefaultHttpHeaders.
        参数:
        headersClass - the class of headers
        headersIt - the iterator on the actual headers
        size - the size of the iterator
        返回:
        a String representation of the headers

      • namesAsString

        public static Set<String> namesAsString(Headers<CharSequence,CharSequence,?> headers)
        Headers.names() and convert each element of Set to a String.
        参数:
        headers - the headers to get the names from
        返回:
        a Set of header values or an empty Set if no values are found.
